headline: Mercer Reveals Average Salary in Thailand Set to Increase by 5.2% in 2026
summary: BANGKOK, December 19, 2025--Mercer, a business of Marsh McLennan (NYSE: MMC) and a global leader in helping clients realize their investment objectives, shape the future of work and enhance health and retirement outcomes for their people, today revealed that the average employee salary in Thailand is set to increase by 5.2% in 2026, slightly higher than the 5% in 2025.

content.title: Mercer Reveals Average Salary in Thailand Set to Increase by 5.2% in 2026
content.summary: BANGKOK, December 19, 2025--Mercer, a business of Marsh McLennan (NYSE: MMC) and a global leader in helping clients realize their investment objectives, shape the future of work and enhance health and retirement outcomes for their people, today revealed that the average employee salary in Thailand is set to increase by 5.2% in 2026, slightly higher than the 5% in 2025.

headline: Mercer China Unveils the Recipients of Its 2025 Star Employers Awards
summary: SHANGHAI, December 19, 2025--Mercer, a business of Marsh McLennan (NYSE: MMC) and a global leader in helping clients realize their investment objectives, shape the future of work and enhance health and retirement outcomes for their people, today announced the recipients of the 2025 China Star Employers Awards at its Best Employers Summit. DBS Bank (China) Limited, Domino's Pizza (China), Ingersoll-Rand (China) Investment Company Limited, Shanghai Disney Resort, Starbucks China, and Universal Bei
